get.summary: Returns a greeting message
get.description: Returns a simple hello message from the FakeGeo API.

200.description: A successful response

get.summary: Returns a collection of geographical lines
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 geographical lines.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical lines.

post.summary: Returns a limited number of geographical lines within a bounding box or GeoJSON polygon
post.description: Accepts a limit and optionally a GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box (bbox) to filter a collection of geographical lines. The limit must be less than or equal to 1000.

limit.description: Number of lines to return (must be <= 1000)

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to filter lines within

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to filter lines within

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical lines.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid limit value, GeoJSON Polygon, or BBox

message.example: Invalid input. Provide a valid limit number, GeoJSON Polygon, or bbox.
Error processing input. An internal error occurred

get.summary: Returns a collection of random geographical lines
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 random geographical lines.

post.description: Accepts a limit and optionally a GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box (bbox) to filter a collection of random geographical lines. The limit must be less than or equal to 1000.

limit.description: Number of lines to return (must be <= 1000)

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to filter lines within

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to filter lines within

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical lines.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid limit value, GeoJSON Polygon, or BBox

message.example: Invalid input. Provide a valid limit number, GeoJSON Polygon, or bbox.
Error processing input. An internal error occurred

get.summary: Returns a collection of random geographical points with properties
get.description: Retrieves a collection of 30 random geographical points along with additional properties.

200.description: A successful response with a collection of geographical points including properties.

description.example: A random point located in the geographic area.

post.summary: Returns a limited number of random geographical points with properties within a bounding box or GeoJSON polygon
post.description: Accepts a limit and optionally a GeoJSON Polygon or bounding box (bbox) to filter a collection of random geographical points along with properties. The limit must be less than or equal to 1000.

limit.description: Number of points to return (must be <= 1000)

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to filter points within

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to filter points within

200.description: A successful response with a collection of random geographical points with properties.

description.example: A random point located within the specified area.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid limit value, GeoJSON Polygon, or BBox

message.example: Invalid input. Provide a valid limit number, GeoJSON Polygon, or bbox.
Error processing input. An internal error occurred

get.summary: Returns a line geojson Feature
get.description: Generates a geographical line.

200.description: A successful response containing the line feature

post.summary: Returns a line geojson feature within a GeoJSON polygon or bbox
post.description: Accepts a GeoJSON Polygon or a bounding box (bbox) and returns a line within it.

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to return a line within it

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to return a line within it

200.description: A successful response

get.summary: Returns a random line geojson Feature
get.description: Generates a random geographical LineString.

200.description: A successful response containing the random line feature

post.summary: Returns a random line geojson feature within a GeoJSON polygon or bbox

geojsonPolygon.description: GeoJSON Polygon to return a random line within it

bbox.description: Bounding box in the format [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] to return a random line within it

200.description: A successful response
